subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Ten months since she last competed, Lindsey Vonn returned to a World Cup course for downhill training in Lake Louise, Alberta, and said afterward that her surgically repaired right knee felt “stable.”
snippet: Ten months since she last competed, Lindsey Vonn returned to a World Cup course for downhill training in Lake Louise, Alberta, and said afterward that her surgically repaired right knee felt “stable.”
